events.title: Summer Festival
events.description: Celebrate summer with live music, food trucks, games, and fun activities for all ages.

events.title: Tech Innovators Conference
events.description: A gathering of leading minds in technology to discuss the future of innovation.

events.title: Downtown Food Festival
events.description: Enjoy delicious food from local vendors and live music in the heart of the city.

events.title: Charity Fun Run
events.description: Join us for a 5K run to support local charities and promote healthy living.

events.title: Art in the Park
events.description: An outdoor exhibition featuring works from emerging and established artists.

events.title: Startup Pitch Night
events.description: Watch startups pitch their ideas to investors and network with entrepreneurs.
